journal.subject: Datapage International Ltd - Invoice of Job: [JOBNAME]
journal.body:
Dear [PENAME],
Please find attached copies of invoice of Job(s): [JOBNAME] which you requested.
Best Wishes, Accounts Department,
Datapage International Ltd., 232 Harolds Cross Road, Dublin 6W. Tel: 00353 1 4960628 Fax: 00353 1 4960636
